channel.title: [Pi] Adding custom item? Rep++
channel.description:
Guys, I saw on a server one time a Custom Whip That was a different colour and gave more bonuses .
I really want to add that but i also want to keep the abbysal whip.
So can anyone tell me how i may add a New whip with a Custom colour? But also keep the Reg. Whip?
Thank you so much :D

item.title: [Pi] Adding custom item? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

you cannot rep people at your rep level. but just search it in the search bar on either google or moparisthebest.com/smf

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Adding custom item? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Class8.java in your client is your items

Look up SilentCJâ€™s guide on how to add Models it tells you how to recolor and i think he posted an ItemDump file
which allows you to add the same items you already have and then recolor them

Read full topic
